entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:36 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
